mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders (userid, order_code, totalPrice, create_time, address_id, receiver, phone, address) VALUES (#{userId}, #{orderCode}, #{totalPrice}, NOW(), #{addressId}, #{receiver}, #{phone}, #{address})
mapper.select: SELECT goods.id, goods.name, goods.NormalPrice, goods.SurprisePrice, goods.imageUrl, goods.description, goods.category,wn_caritem.num FROM goods INNER JOIN wn_caritem ON goods.id = wn_caritem.goodid WHERE wn_caritem.code = #{orderCode}
mapper.delete: DELETE orders, wn_caritem FROM orders LEFT JOIN wn_caritem ON orders.order_code = wn_caritem.code AND orders.userid = wn_caritem.userid WHERE orders.order_code = #{orderCode} AND orders.userid = #{userId}
